name: ui-styles
readme:
#ui-styles
This is a set of less include files, with an integrated build and test
page.

##Mix in Less

```shell
npm install --save custom-elements/ui-styles
```

```less
@import "node_modules/ui-styles/variables";
@import "node_modules/ui-styles/typography";
```

##Direct in HTML
You can use the built css versions if you like.

```html
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="node_modules/ui-styles/variables.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="node_modules/ui-styles/typography.css">
```
description: This is a set of less include files, with an integrated build and test page.
